summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 26332, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending and establishing of Montlake Boulevard, from the north line of the right of way of the Lake Washington Canal to the north line of the Campus of the State University and Brintnall Place, from Fifteenth Avenue Northeast to Montlake Boulevard, as extended herein, and of a public street and highway across block eight (8), Lake Washington Shore Lands, as public streets and highways, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment of the cost of said improvement be made by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law," approved February 4th, 1911.
